column11: pos"                #SAVE ESSENTIALS : The data required to be tracked in order for the analysis to work

column1: finalSnap 251                                                                    # Max number of snapshots in simulation
selectSnap 235                                                                   # Set snapshot to select data from

percentiles "0.13
column7: 99.87"                      # Set Percentiles of parameter of interest

Rinner "25.0

Axes "0
column4: 2 = z whichever is not chosen will be used as line of sight axis

column1: QuadPlotBool 0                                                                  # "Boolean" for whether to plot QUAD plot. 0 = False
boxsize 700                                                                      # Plots box size (+/- boxsize/2 kpc on each edge)
boxlos 20                                                                        # Plots Line of sight box size (+/- boxlos/2 kpc centred on galaxy centre)
pixres 0.2                                                                       # Pixel Resolution in plane of Plot
pixreslos 4                                                                      # Pixel Resolution in LOS of plot
